channel.title: Weird Errors, Need Explanation and possibly a fix
channel.description:
I just started coding rsps again for the first time in like 3ish years
I was wondering if anyone could help my figure out this error i'm getting with my client
[code]--------------------Configuration: <Default>-------------------- Model cache loaded. New File: 1210 loaded! java.lang.NullPointerException at Class36.methodCustomAnimations2(Class36.java:110) at Animation.unpackConfig(Animation.java:1628) at client.startUp(client.java:7883) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:4936) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722) java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1 at Class36.methodCustomAnimations(Class36.java:56) at Animation.unpackConfig(Animation.java:141) at client.startUp(client.java:7883) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:4936) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722) java.lang.NullPointerException at Class36.methodCustomAnimations(Class36.java:14) at Animation.unpackConfig(Animation.java:1482) at client.startUp(client.java:7883) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:4936) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722) New File: 1290 loaded! java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1 at Class36.methodCustomAnimations(Class36.java:56) at Animation.unpackConfig(Animation.java:2084) at client.startUp(client.java:7883) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:4936) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722)
Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 java.lang.NullPointerException[/code]
That last bit of code in teal, repeatedly prints out in the command prompt.
EDIT: Sorry, i'm a noob, didn't know it wouldn't make it teal within [code][/code] xD
It's the java.lang.NullPointerException line that repeats over and over again.

item.title: Weird Errors, Need Explanation and possibly a fix
item.dc:creator: @Ike_TeeHee Ike TeeHee
item.description:
@Ike_TeeHee wrote:

I just started coding rsps again for the first time in like 3ish years

I was wondering if anyone could help my figure out this error i’m getting with my client

[code]--------------------Configuration: --------------------
Model cache loaded.
New File: 1210 loaded!
java.lang.NullPointerException
at Class36.methodCustomAnimations2(Class36.java:110)
at Animation.unpackConfig(Animation.java:1628)
at client.startUp(client.java:7883)
at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33)
at client.run(client.java:4936)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722)
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1
at Class36.methodCustomAnimations(Class36.java:56)
at Animation.unpackConfig(Animation.java:141)
at client.startUp(client.java:7883)
at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33)
at client.run(client.java:4936)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722)
java.lang.NullPointerException
at Class36.methodCustomAnimations(Class36.java:14)
at Animation.unpackConfig(Animation.java:1482)
at client.startUp(client.java:7883)
at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33)
at client.run(client.java:4936)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722)
New File: 1290 loaded!
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1
at Class36.methodCustomAnimations(Class36.java:56)
at Animation.unpackConfig(Animation.java:2084)
at client.startUp(client.java:7883)
at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33)
at client.run(client.java:4936)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722)

Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36
java.lang.NullPointerException[/code]

That last bit of code in teal, repeatedly prints out in the command prompt.

EDIT: Sorry, i’m a noob, didn’t know it wouldn’t make it teal within xD

It’s the java.lang.NullPointerException line that repeats over and over again.
